org.clapper.util.classutil
Class AbstractClassFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.clapper.util.classutil.ClassModifiersClassFilter
      org.clapper.util.classutil.AbstractClassFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClassFilter
public class AbstractClassFilter
extends ClassModifiersClassFilter

AbstractClassFilter implements a ClassFilter that matches class names that (a) can be loaded and (b) are abstract. It relies on the pool of classes read by a ClassFinder; it's not really useful by itself.

This class is really just a convenient specialization of the ClassModifiersClassFilter class.

See Also:
ClassFilter, ClassModifiersClassFilter, ClassFinder, Modifier

Constructor Summary
AbstractClassFilter()
          Construct a new AbstractClassFilter that will accept only abstract classes.
